dmca.title: Kappa Sigma Doesn't Digg Posted Manual
dmca.body:
Re: Demand for Immediate Take Down * Notice of Infringing Activity
     URL: 
http://digg.com/arts_culture/Secret_Ritual_of_Kappa_Sigma_Fraternity_manual_EXPOSED 



Dear Sir/Madam:

Kappa Sigma Fraternity has received information that the operators  
at the web site of the domain listed above, which appears to be a  
server under your control, are offering unlicensed copies of, or are  
engaged in other unauthorized activities relating to a copyrighted  
book owned by Kappa Sigma Fraternity.

1. Identification of copyrighted works:

Book: The Ritual of Kappa Sigma

Copyright owner:
Kappa Sigma Fraternity

2. Copyright infringing material or activity found at the following  
location:
http://digg.com/arts_culture/Secret_Ritual_of_Kappa_Sigma_Fraternity_manual_EXPOSED 


The above location is offering unauthorized reproductions of the  
book that infringes on Kappa Sigma Fraternity
